name: Dual Duel: Neon Nights
description:
Welcome to Neon City, its a chill place with smooth retro beats and long, seemingly endless highways.

Only thing is the roads have a serious construction problem, so avoiding building debris left behind by careless contractors is part of everyday life here.

Your buddy just challenged you to a race to prove who's more skilled at driving, so what're you waiting for?

Made for the Global Game Jam 2022
#GGJ2022
